stdout:
Table	Create Table
users	CREATE TABLE `users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `openId` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `name` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `loginMethod` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `role` enum('user','admin') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'user',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `lastSignedIn` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `phoneNumber` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `userRole` enum('public','marked_initiate','marked_member','marked_inner_circle','staff','admin') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'public',
  `userStatus` enum('active','revoked','banned') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
  `callSign` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `chapter` varchar(128) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'South Jakarta',
  `markState` enum('outside','initiate','member','inner_circle','dormant','restricted','revoked') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'outside',
  `rankDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `clearanceState` enum('none','applied','granted','expired','denied') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'none',
  `clearanceExpiresAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `clearanceCode` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `invitesAvailable` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `reputationPoints` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `referralCode` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `lastActiveAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `revokedReason` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `revokedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `revokedById` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `users_openId_unique` (`openId`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=120001
